sentences.sContent: Berlusconi submitted his resignation on Saturday as the nation grappled with a major debt crisis, to scenes of jubilation among thousands of people in the streets of Rome.
sentences.sContent_eng: Berlusconi submitted his resignation on Saturday as the nation grappled with a major debt crisis, to scenes of jubilation among thousands of people in the streets of Rome.
sentences.sCn: 贝卢斯科尼于上周六辞职，成千上万罗马民众走上街头庆祝。意大利近日深陷大规模债务危机。

remMethod.val: jubila (看作jubilant， 欢呼) + tion (表示名词) → 欢呼着庆祝 → 庆祝
